body.p: In the Syntris game you work with sentence functions.

section.title: Begin to play
section.p: Activate the Java window with the arrow, and then press the F2 key on your keyuboard.

section.title: Sentence code
section.p: You may choose sentence collection or a specific sentence, say SMEA143. In this case you are not allowed to register your result. The sentence collections are marked with SMEA, SMEB and SMEC.

section.title: Playing
section.p: The computer choses sentence and divides it into constituents. Then a box containing four different syntactic functions drops down from above. You may use the left and right arrows to move the box to the right or left to place it over a word, and you may change the order of functions by the up and down arrows. The correct function shall be placed on the bottom of the box, and then dropped on a word representing that function

section.title: Speed and pause
section.p: If you press the space bar, the box drops faster. If you want a pause, press the p key. When you press the same key again, the game will continue.

section.title: Points
section.p: Every time the box falls down on the háve go kássa gahččá rivttes cealkkalahtu ala, de don oaččut 10 čuoggá ja cealkkalahttu ránoda. Juohke háve kássa gahččá boastto sadjái, de massát 5 čuoggá ja dihtor vállje ođđa cealkaga. Muhto boares cealkka báhcá ođđa cealkaga vuollái. Jus máhtát válljet rivttes funkšuvnna cealkkalahtuide mat leat dan alde, de beasat geahččalit oažžut daid maid eret.
Go 10 cealkaga leat bordojuvvon badjelaga, de speallu nohká. Don sáhtát maid bissehit spealu jus válljet "Stop Game" dahje "Quit Game"-menyas.

section.title: Results
section.p: If your result is among the top 10 today, or among the overall top 100, you may register your name and where you come from.

section.title: Sentence constituents
section.p: We use the following sentence constituents:

Mus leat ustibat. Min bussás leat alit čalmmit.
